anya-e0906n:9_0: Pucchā – paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle āvuso dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā
anya-e0906n:9_1: porāṇasaṃgītikārā paṭhamaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ saṃgāyitvā suttantapiṭake ca dīghamajjhimasaṃyuttaaṅguttarasaṃkhāte
anya-e0906n:9_2: cattāro mahānikāye saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ kiṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0906n:10_0: Vissajjanā – paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle bhante dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā
anya-e0906n:10_1: porāṇasaṃgītikārā paṭhamaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ saṃgāyitvā suttantapiṭake ca dīghamajjhimasaṃyuttaaṅguttarasaṃkhāte
anya-e0906n:10_2: cattāro nikāye saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0906n:11_0: Pucchā – imissampi āvuso chaṭṭhasaṃgītiyaṃ sakalañceva vinayapiṭakaṃ saṃgītaṃ, te
anya-e0906n:11_1: ca cattāro mahānikāyā. Kālo dāni āvuso sampatto abhidhammapiṭakaṃ saṃgāyituṃ, tasmāhaṃ
anya-e0906n:11_2: taṃ tattha pucchitabbāni pucchissāmi. Abhidhammo nāmesa āvuso kenaṭṭhena abhidhammoti vuccati.
anya-e0906n:12: Vissajjanā – dhammātireka dhammavisesaṭṭhena bhante abhidhammoti vuccati.
anya-e0906n:13: Pucchā – so panesa āvuso abhidhammo kena kattha kadā ca adhigato.
anya-e0906n:14: Vissajjanā – so kho bhante abhidhammo sabbaññubuddhena mahābodhimaṇḍamūle vesākhapuṇṇamiyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ adhigato.
anya-e0906n:15: Pucchā – kattha panesa āvuso abhidhammo bhagavatā kadā ca vicito.
anya-e0906n:16: Vissajjanā – so kho bhante abhidhammo bhagavatā mahābodhimaṇḍe ratanagharasattāhe vicito.
anya-e0906n:17: Pucchā – kattha panesa āvuso abhidhammo bhagavatā kadā kassatthāya ca desito.
anya-e0906n:18_0: Vissajjanā – so kho bhante abhidhammo bhagavatā devesu tāvatiṃsesu pāricchattakamūlamhi
anya-e0906n:18_1: paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ abhisambodhito sattame vasse mātaraṃ pamukhaṃ katvā dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi
anya-e0906n:18_2: āgamma sannisinnānaṃ devatānaṃ caturoghanittharaṇatthāya anto vassaṃ desito.
anya-e0906n:19: Pucchā – kenesa āvuso abhidhammo paṭhamaṃ manussaloke patiggahito, kassa ca puna tena desito.
anya-e0906n:20_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmatā bhante sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā esa abhidhammo paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0906n:20_1: manussaloke patiggahito, teneva bhante āyasmatā sāriputtattherena attano saddhivihārikānaṃ
anya-e0906n:22: Vissajjanā – sekhā ca bhante puthujjanā kalyāṇakā ca sikkhanti.
anya-e0906n:26: Vissajjanā – yesaṃ bhante vattati, te dhārenti.
anya-e0906n:28: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0906n:32: Pucchā – so panesa āvuso abhidhammo dhammasaṅgaṇivibhaṅgādipakaraṇaparicchedavasena sattavidho. Tesu paṭhamaṃ bhagavatā kataraṃ pakaraṇaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:33: Vissajjanā – paṭhamaṃ bhante dhammasaṅgaṇipakaraṇaṃ bhagavatā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:34: Pucchā – dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ āvuso atthi mātikā, atthi padabhājanīyaṃ. Tesu mātikaṃ nikkhipantena bhagavatā kataṃ nikkhittā.
anya-e0906n:35_0: Vissajjanā – mātikaṃ bhante nikkhipantena bhagavatā “kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammā
anya-e0906n:35_1: abyākatā dhammā. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā
anya-e0906n:35_2: dhammā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā. Vipākā dhammā vipākadhammadhammā
anya-e0906n:35_3: nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā”ti evamādinā dvāvīsatiyā tikānaṃ vasena. “Hetū dhammā
anya-e0906n:35_4: na hetū dhammā. Sahetukā dhammā ahetukā dhammā.
anya-e0906n:36_0: Hetusampayuttā dhammā hetuvippayuttā dhammā. Hetū ceva dhammā sahetukā ca sahetukā
anya-e0906n:36_1: ceva dhammā na ca hetū. Hetū ceva dhammā hetusampayuttā ca hetusampayuttā ceva dhammā
anya-e0906n:36_2: na ca hetū. Na hetū kho pana dhammā sahetukāpi ahetukāpī”ti evamādinā dukasatānañca
anya-e0906n:38_0: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ padabhājanīye cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalā
anya-e0906n:38_1: dhammātipadassa atthaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā kathaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:39_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante dhammasaṅgaṇipakaraṇe cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalā
anya-e0906n:39_1: dhammāti padassa atthaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā “katame dhammā kusalā. Yasmiṃ samaye
anya-e0906n:39_2: kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0906n:39_3: vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā gandhārammaṇaṃ vā rasārammaṇaṃ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā dhammārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0906n:39_4: vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha. Tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti vedanā hoti saññā hoti cetanā
anya-e0906n:39_5: hoti cittaṃ hoti vitakko hoti vicāro hoti pīti hoti sukhaṃ hoti cittassekaggatā hotī”ti
anya-e0906n:39_6: evamādinā kāmāvacarakusalaṃ tīhi mahāvārehi vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:41_0: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷiyaṃ cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalā dhammāti
anya-e0906n:41_1: padassa atthaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā kathaṃ rūpāvacarakusalañca arūpāvacarakusalañca
anya-e0906n:42_0: Vissajjanā – rūpāvacarakusalañca arūpāvacarakusalañca bhante “katame dhammā kusalā.
anya-e0906n:42_1: Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi
anya-e0906n:42_2: savitakkaṃ savitakkaṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇa”nti
anya-e0906n:44: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷiyaṃ cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalā dhammāti padassa atthaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā kathaṃ lokuttarakusalaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:45_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalā dhammāti
anya-e0906n:45_1: padassa atthaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā “katame dhammā kusalā. Yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ
anya-e0906n:45_2: jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā
anya-e0906n:45_3: vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiñña”nti
anya-e0906n:45_4: evamādinā bhagavatā lokuttarakusalaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:47: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso akusalā dhammāti mātikāpadassa atthaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā kathaṃ akusalaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:48_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante akusalā dhammāti mātikāpadassa atthaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā
anya-e0906n:48_1: “katame dhammā akusalā. Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ
anya-e0906n:48_2: diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddhārammaṇaṃ vā gandhārammaṇaṃ vā rasārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0906n:48_3: vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha. Tasmiṃ samaye phasso
anya-e0906n:48_4: hoti vedanā hoti saññā hoti cetanā hoti cittaṃ hotī”ti evamādinā akusalaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:50_0: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷiyaṃ cittuppādakaṇḍarūpakaṇḍesu abyākatā
anya-e0906n:50_1: dhammāti mātikāpadassa atthaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā kathaṃ abyākatā dhammā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:51_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ abyākatā dhammāti padassa atthaṃ
anya-e0906n:51_1: vibhajantena bhagavatā “katame dhammā abyākatā. Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa
anya-e0906n:51_2: kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ
anya-e0906n:51_3: rūpārammaṇaṃ. Tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti vedanā hoti saññā hoti cetanā hoti cittaṃ
anya-e0906n:51_4: hotī”ti evamādinā ca cittuppādakaṇḍe, rūpakaṇḍe ca “katame dhammā abyākatā. Kusalākusalānaṃ
anya-e0906n:51_5: dhammānaṃ vipākā kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā arūpāvacarā apariyāpannā vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho
anya-e0906n:51_6: saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho. Ye ca dhammā kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca
anya-e0906n:51_7: kammavipākā. Sabbañca rūpaṃ asaṅkhatā ca dhātu. Ime dhammā abyākatā”ti evamādinā
anya-e0906n:51_8: ca abyākatā dhammā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:53: Pucchā – sattasu āvuso abhidhammappakaraṇesu vibhaṅgappakaraṇe bhagavatā kati vibhaṅgā desitā.
anya-e0906n:54_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu dutiye vibhaṅgappakaraṇe
anya-e0906n:54_1: khandhavibhaṅgo āyatanavibhaṅgo dhātuvibhaṅgo saccavibhaṅgo indriyavibhaṅgo paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅgo
anya-e0906n:54_4: khuddakavatthuvibhaṅgo dhammahadayavibhaṅgoti bhagavatā aṭṭhārasa vibhaṅgā desitā.
anya-e0906n:56: Pucchā – tesu āvuso aṭṭhārasasu vibhaṅgesu paṭhame khandhavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ khandhā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:57_0: Vissajjanā – tesu bhante aṭṭhārasasu vibhaṅgesu paṭhame khandhavibhaṅge “pañcakkhandhā
anya-e0906n:57_1: rūpakkhandho vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho. Tattha
anya-e0906n:57_2: katamo rūpakkhandho, yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā
anya-e0906n:57_3: vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā, tadekajjhaṃ abhisaññūhitvā
anya-e0906n:57_5: tīhi mahānayehi bhagavatā khandhā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:59: Pucchā – dutiye pana āvuso āyatanavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ āyatanāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:60_0: Vissajjanā – dutiye bhante āyatanavibhaṅge “dvādasāyatanāni cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ
anya-e0906n:60_1: sotāyatanaṃ saddāyatanaṃ ghānāyatanaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ jivhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ kāyāyatanaṃ
anya-e0906n:60_2: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ manāyatanaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ. Cakkhuṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā vipariṇāmadhammaṃ,
anya-e0906n:60_3: rūpā aniccā dukkhā anattā vipariṇāmadhammā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā suttantabhājanīyaabhidhammabhājanīyapañhāpucchakasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0906n:62: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso vibhaṅgappakaraṇe tatiye dhātuvibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ dhātuyo vitthārena vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:63_0: Vissajjanā – tatiye bhante dhātuvibhaṅge “cha dhātuyo pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu
anya-e0906n:63_2: tīhi mahānayehi bhagavatā dhātuyo vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:65: Pucchā – catutthe pana āvuso saccavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ saccāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:66_0: Vissajjanā – catutthe bhante saccavibhaṅge “cattāri ariyasaccāni dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ,
anya-e0906n:66_1: dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā
anya-e0906n:66_2: ariyasaccaṃ. Tattha katamaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, jātipi dukkhā, jarāpi dukkhā, maraṇampi
anya-e0906n:66_3: dukkhaṃ, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsāpi dukkhā, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho, piyehi
anya-e0906n:66_4: vippayogo dukkho, yampicchaṃ na labhati, tampi dukkhaṃ, saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā
anya-e0906n:66_6: mahānayehi bhagavatā saccāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:68: Pucchā – pañcame pana āvuso indriyavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ indriyāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:69_0: Vissajjanā – pañcame pana bhante indriyavibhaṅge “bāvīsatindriyāni cakkhundriyaṃ
anya-e0906n:69_1: sotindriyaṃ ghānindriyaṃ jivhindriyaṃ kāyindriyaṃ manindriyaṃ…pe… aññātāvindriya”nti
anya-e0906n:71: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso vibhaṅgappakaraṇe chaṭṭhe paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ paṭiccasamuppādo vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:74: Pucchā – sattame pana āvuso satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ satipaṭṭhānā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:75_0: Vissajjanā – sattame bhante satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅge “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā idha bhikkhu
anya-e0906n:75_1: ajjhattaṃ kāye kāyānupassī viharati, bahiddhā kāye kāyānupassī viharati, ajjhattabahiddhā
anya-e0906n:75_2: kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassa”nti
anya-e0906n:77: Pucchā – aṭṭhame pana āvuso sammappadhānavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ sammappadhānā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:78_0: Vissajjanā – aṭṭhame bhante sammappadhānavibhaṅge “cattāro sammappadhānā idha bhikkhu
anya-e0906n:78_1: anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ
anya-e0906n:78_2: ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati, uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya
anya-e0906n:78_3: chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati, anuppannānaṃ
anya-e0906n:78_4: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti
anya-e0906n:78_5: padahati, uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya
anya-e0906n:78_6: bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahatī”ti
anya-e0906n:78_7: evamādinā bhagavatā sammappadhānā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:80: Pucchā – navame pana āvuso iddhipādavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ iddhipādā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:81_0: Vissajjanā – navame bhante iddhipādavibhaṅge “cattāro iddhipādā idha bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ
anya-e0906n:81_2: evamādinā tīhi mahānayehi bhagavatā iddhipādā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:83: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso vibhaṅgappakaraṇe dasame bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ bojjhaṅgā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:84_0: Vissajjanā – dasame bhante bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge “satta bojjhaṅgā satisambojjhaṅgo dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo
anya-e0906n:84_2: Tattha katamo satisambojjhaṅgo, idha bhikkhu satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato
anya-e0906n:84_3: cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā hoti anussaritā, ayaṃ vuccati satisambojjhaṅgo”ti
anya-e0906n:86: Pucchā – ekādasame pana āvuso maggaṅgavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ maggaṅgā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:87_0: Vissajjanā – ekādasame bhante maggaṅgavibhaṅge “ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. Seyyathidaṃ,
anya-e0906n:87_1: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati
anya-e0906n:87_3: tīhi mahānayehi maggaṅgā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:89: Pucchā – dvādasamo pana āvuso jhānavibhaṅgo bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:90_0: Vissajjanā – dvādasamo bhante jhānavibhaṅgo “idha bhikkhu pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto
anya-e0906n:90_1: viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu
anya-e0906n:90_2: indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū pubbarattāpararattaṃ jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto”ti
anya-e0906n:92: Pucchā – terasame pana āvuso appamaññāvibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ appamaññāyo vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:93_0: Vissajjanā – terasame bhante appamaññāvibhaṅge “catasso appamaññāyo idha bhikkhu
anya-e0906n:93_1: mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṃ. Tathā tatiyaṃ.
anya-e0906n:93_2: Tathā catutthaṃ. Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ mettāsahagatena
anya-e0906n:93_3: cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharatī”ti evamādinā
anya-e0906n:95: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso vibhaṅgappakaraṇe cuddasame sikkhāpadavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ sikkhāpadāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:96_0: Vissajjanā – cuddasame bhante sikkhāpadavibhaṅge “pañca sikkhāpadāni pāṇātipātā veramaṇī
anya-e0906n:96_1: sikkhāpadaṃ, adinnādānā veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṃ, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṃ,
anya-e0906n:96_2: musāvādā veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṃ, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṃ.
anya-e0906n:96_3: Tattha katamaṃ pāṇātipātā veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṃ, yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ
anya-e0906n:96_4: cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ pāṇātipātā viramantassā”ti
anya-e0906n:98: Pucchā – pannarasame pana āvuso paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ paṭisambhidāyo vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:99_0: Vissajjanā – pannarasame bhante paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge “catasso paṭisambhidā atthapaṭisambhidā
anya-e0906n:99_1: dhammapaṭisambhidā niruttipaṭisambhidā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā. Atthe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā,
anya-e0906n:99_2: dhamme ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā,
anya-e0906n:99_3: ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā catasso paṭisambhidāyo
anya-e0906n:101: Pucchā – soḷasame pana āvuso ñāṇavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṃ ñāṇāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:102_0: Vissajjanā – soḷasame bhante ñāṇavibhaṅge “ekavidhena ñāṇavatthu pañcaviññāṇā na
anya-e0906n:102_1: hetū, ahetukā, hetuvippayuttā, sappaccayā, saṅkhatā, arūpā, lokiyā, sāsavā”ti evamādinā
anya-e0906n:102_2: ekakato paṭṭhāya yāva dasakā bhagavatā ñāṇāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:104: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso vibhaṅgappakaraṇe sattarasamo khuddakavatthuvibhaṅgo bhagavatā kathaṃ desito.
anya-e0906n:105_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante dutiye vibhaṅgappakaraṇe sattarasamo khuddakavatthuvibhaṅgo
anya-e0906n:105_1: “jātimado, gottamado, ārogyamado, yobbanamado, jīvitamado”ti evamādinā ekakato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0906n:105_2: yāva aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritaṃ bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:107: Pucchā – tattha āvuso aṭṭhārasamo dhammahadayavibhaṅgo bhagavatā kathaṃ vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:108_0: Vissajjanā – aṭṭhārasamo bhante dhammahadayavibhaṅgo “kati khandhā, kati āyatanāni,
anya-e0906n:108_1: kati dhātuyo, kati saccāni, kati indriyāni, kati hetū, kati āhārā, kati phassā, kati
anya-e0906n:108_2: vedanā, kati saññā, kati cetanā, kati cittāni. Pañcakkhandhā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa
anya-e0906n:108_3: dhātuyo, cattāri saccāni, bāvīsatindriyāni, nava hetū, cattāro āhārā, satta phassā,
anya-e0906n:108_4: satta vedanā, satta saññā, satta cetanā, satta cittānī”ti evamādinā sabbasaṅgāhakādīhi
anya-e0906n:108_5: dasahi vārehi bhagavatā vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:109: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā uppādakakammaāyuppamāṇavāro vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:110_0: Vissajjanā – dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā kattha upapajjanti.
anya-e0906n:110_1: Dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā appekacce khattiyamahāsālānaṃ
anya-e0906n:110_2: sahabyataṃ upapajjanti, appekacce brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ, appekacce gahapatimahāsālānaṃ,
anya-e0906n:110_3: appekacce cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ, appekacce tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ, appekacce yāmānaṃ
anya-e0906n:110_4: devānaṃ, appekacce tusitānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjantīti evamādinā bhante tattha
anya-e0906n:114_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā aṭṭhārasahi buddhadhammehi samannāgatena abhidhamme aṭṭhārasahi
anya-e0906n:114_1: vibhaṅgehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ dutiyaṃ vibhaṅgappakaraṇaṃ desetvā tadanantaraṃ dhātukathaṃ
anya-e0906n:114_2: nāma tatiyaṃ pakaraṇaṃ kathaṃ vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:115_0: Vissajjanā – tatiyaṃ bhante dhātukathaṃ nāma abhidhammapiṭakaṃ “saṅgaho asaṅgaho,
anya-e0906n:115_1: saṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṃ, asaṅgahitena saṅgahitaṃ, saṅgahitena saṅgahitaṃ, asaṅgahitena
anya-e0906n:115_2: asaṅgahitaṃ. Sampayogo vippayogo, sampayuttena vippayuttaṃ, vippayuttena sampayuttaṃ,
anya-e0906n:115_3: sampayuttena sampayuttaṃ, vippayuttena vippayuttaṃ. Saṅgahitena sampayuttaṃ vippayuttaṃ,
anya-e0906n:115_4: sampayuttena saṅgahitaṃ asaṅgahitaṃ, asaṅgahitena sampayuttaṃ vippayuttaṃ, vippayuttena
anya-e0906n:115_5: saṅgahitaṃ asaṅgahita”nti evamādinā pañca mātikāyo paṭhamaṃ nikkhipitvā saṅgahāsaṅgahādīhi
anya-e0906n:115_6: cuddasahi nayehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:117: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā sabbadhātukusalena abhidhammapiṭake tatiyaṃ dhātukathāpakaraṇaṃ desetvā tadanantaraṃ catutthaṃ puggalapaññattippakaraṇaṃ kathaṃ vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:118_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante catutthaṃ puggalapaññattippakaraṇaṃ “cha paññattiyo
anya-e0906n:118_1: khandhapaññatti āyatanapaññatti dhātupaññatti saccapaññatti indriyapaññatti puggalapaññatti.
anya-e0906n:118_2: Kittāvatā khandhānaṃ khandhapaññatti, yāvatā pañcakkhandhā, rūpakkhandho vedanākkhandho
anya-e0906n:118_3: saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho. Ettāvatā khandhānaṃ khandhapaññattī”ti
anya-e0906n:120_1: catutthaṃ puggalapaññattippakaraṇaṃ desetvā tadanantaraṃ pañcamaṃ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ kathaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:121_0: Vissajjanā – sabbaparamatthapaññattidhammakusalena bhante bhagavatā loke aggapuggalena
anya-e0906n:121_1: abhidhammapiṭake catutthaṃ puggalapaññattippakaraṇaṃ desetvā tadanantaraṃ kathāvatthudesanāya
anya-e0906n:121_2: vāre sampatte “anāgate mama sāvako moggaliputtatissatthero nāma uppannaṃ sāsanamalaṃ
anya-e0906n:121_3: sodhetvā tatiyasaṅgītiṃ karonto bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe nisinno sakavāde pañca suttasatāni
anya-e0906n:121_4: paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṃ samodhānetvā, imaṃ pakaraṇaṃ bhājessatī”ti tassokāsaṃ
anya-e0906n:121_5: karontena puggalavāre aṭṭhamukhā vādayuttiṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbakathāmaggesu asampuṇṇabhāṇavāratthāya
anya-e0906n:121_6: tantiyā mātikā nikkhepamattena pañcamaṃ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ saṃkhepato desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:122: Pucchā – adhunā pākaṭaṃ panāvuso vitthāraṃ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ kadā kena kattha kathañca vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:123_0: Vissajjanā – taṃ kho bhante bhagavato nayamukhaṃ nissāya āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena
anya-e0906n:123_1: tatiyasaṃgītikāle pāṭaliputte asokārāme saṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassānaṃ samāgame bhagavatā
anya-e0906n:123_2: dinnanayavasena tathāgatena ṭhapitamātikaṃ vibhajantena sakavāde pañcasuttasatāni
anya-e0906n:123_3: paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṃ āharitvā idaṃ paravādamathanaṃ adhunā pākaṭaṃ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0906n:124: Pucchā – kati āvuso tattha kathāyo tena āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:125: Vissajjanā – tattha bhante vācanāmaggato dve ca satāni sattavīsati ca kathāyo āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:127: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha paṭhamā puggalakathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:128_0: Vissajjanā – puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti, āmantā. Yo saccikaṭṭho
anya-e0906n:128_1: paramattho, tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti, na hevaṃ vattabbe.
anya-e0906n:128_2: Ājānāhi niggahaṃ hañci puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena, tena vata re
anya-e0906n:128_3: vattabbe “yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho, tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā”ti.
anya-e0906n:128_4: Yaṃ tattha vadesi “vattabbe kho ‘puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’, no
anya-e0906n:128_5: ca vattabbe ‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho, tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā”ti,
anya-e0906n:128_6: micchāti evamādinā bhante tattha paṭhamā puggalakathā pañca bhāṇavāramattāya tantiyā
anya-e0906n:130: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso kathāvatthuppakaraṇe dutiyavagge dutiyā aññāṇakathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:131_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe dutiyavagge dutiyā
anya-e0906n:131_1: aññāṇakathā “atthi arahato aññāṇanti, āmantā. Atthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo
anya-e0906n:131_2: avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjānīvaraṇanti, na hevaṃ vattabbe.
anya-e0906n:131_3: Natthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ
anya-e0906n:131_4: avijjānivaraṇanti, āmantā. Hañci natthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo
anya-e0906n:131_5: avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjānīvaraṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe “atthi
anya-e0906n:131_6: arahato aññāṇa”nti evamādinā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā bhāsitā.
anya-e0906n:133: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe tatiyavagge ekādasamā asaññakathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:134_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe tatiyavagge ekādasamā
anya-e0906n:134_1: asaññakathā “asaññasattesu saññā atthīti, āmantā. Saññābhavo saññāgati saññāsattāvāso
anya-e0906n:134_2: saññāsaṃsāro saññāyoni saññattabhāvapaṭilābhoti, na hevaṃ vattabbe”ti evamādinā āyasmatā
anya-e0906n:136: Saññābhavo saññāgati saññāsattāvāso saññāsaṃsāro saññāyoni saññattabhāvapaṭilābho.
anya-e0906n:138: Nanu asaññabhavo asaññagati asaññasattāvāso asaññasaṃsāro asaññayoni asaññattabhāvapaṭilābho.
anya-e0906n:139: Hañci asaññabhavo asaññagati asaññasattāvāso asaññasaṃsāro asaññayoni asaññattabhāvapaṭilābho, no ca vata re vattabbe asaññasattesu saññā atthi.
anya-e0906n:141: Pañcavokārabhavo gati sattāvāso saṃsāro yoni attabhāvapaṭilābho.
anya-e0906n:142: Nanu ekavokārabhavo gati sattāvāso saṃsāro yoni attabhāvapaṭilābho.
anya-e0906n:143: Hañci ekavokārabhavo gati sattāvāso saṃsāro yoni attabhāvapaṭilābho, no ca vata re vattabbe asaññasattesu saññā atthi.
anya-e0906n:146: Pucchā – chaṭṭhavagge pana āvuso aṭṭhamā pathavīdhātu sanidassanātiādikathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:147_0: Vissajjanā – chaṭṭhavagge bhante aṭṭhamā pathavīdhātu sanidassanātiādikathā “pathavīdhātu
anya-e0906n:147_1: sanidassanāti āmantā. Rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ rūpadhātu nīlaṃ pītakaṃ lohitakaṃ odātaṃ
anya-e0906n:147_2: cakkhuviññeyyaṃ cakkhusmiṃ paṭihaññati cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchatīti, na hevaṃ vattabbe”ti
anya-e0906n:147_3: evamādinā āyasmatā mahāmoggali puttatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:150: Tena hi na vattabbaṃ cakkhuñca paṭicca pathavīdhātuñca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0906n:152: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe aṭṭhamavagge dutiyā antarābhavakathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:153_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe aṭṭhamavagge dutiyā
anya-e0906n:153_1: antarābhavakathā “atthi antarābhavoti, āmantā. Kāmabhavoti, na hevaṃ vattabbe…pe…
anya-e0906n:153_2: atthi antarābhavoti, āmantā. Rūpabhavoti, na hevaṃ vattabbe…pe… atthi antarābhavoti,
anya-e0906n:153_3: āmantā. Arūpabhavoti, na hevaṃ vattabbe”ti evamādinā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena
anya-e0906n:157: Kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare atthi antarābhavo.
anya-e0906n:159: Rūpabhavassa ca arūpabhavassa ca antare atthi antarābhavo.
anya-e0906n:160: Kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare natthi antarābhavo.
anya-e0906n:161: Hañci kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare natthi antarābhavo, no ca vata re vattabbe atthi antarābhavo.
anya-e0906n:163: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe cuddasamavagge dutiyā saḷāyatanuppattikathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:164_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe cuddasamevagge
anya-e0906n:164_1: dutiyā saḷāyatanuppattikathā “saḷāyatanaṃ apubbaṃ acarimaṃ mātukucchismiṃ saṇṭhātīti,
anya-e0906n:164_2: āmantā. Sabbaṅgapaccaṅgī ahīnindriyo mātukucchismiṃ okkamatīti, na hevaṃ vattabbe”ti
anya-e0906n:164_3: evamādinā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:169: Upapattesiyena cittena hatthā saṇṭhanti, pādā saṇṭhanti, sīsaṃ saṇṭhāti, kaṇṇo saṇṭhāti, nāsikā saṇṭhāti, mukhaṃ saṇṭhāti, dantā saṇṭhanti.
anya-e0906n:171_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā yamakapāṭihīrāvasāne tāvatiṃsadevalokaṃ gantvā dasasahassalokadhātūhi
anya-e0906n:171_1: āgamma sannisinnānaṃ devānaṃ abhidhammadesanaṃ desentena paṭhamaṃ abhidhammapiṭake
anya-e0906n:171_2: pañcappakaraṇāni desetvā tadanantaraṃ chaṭṭhaṃ yamakappakaraṇaṃ desentena kati yamakappakaraṇāni
anya-e0906n:172_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavatā bhante yamassa visayātītena yamakapāṭihīrāvasāne tāvatiṃsadevalokaṃ
anya-e0906n:172_1: gantvā tattha dasasahassalokadhātūhi āgamma sannisinnānaṃ devatānaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ
anya-e0906n:172_2: desentena abhidhammapiṭake pūrimāni pañcappakaraṇāni desetvā tadanantaraṃ chaṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0906n:172_3: yamakappakaraṇaṃ mūlayamakaṃ khandhayamakaṃ āyatanayamakaṃ dhātuyamakaṃ saccayamakaṃ
anya-e0906n:172_4: saṅkhārayamakaṃ anusayayamakaṃ cittayamakaṃ dhammayamakaṃ indriyayamakanti dasa yamakappakaraṇāni
anya-e0906n:174: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ mūlayamakaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:175_0: Vissajjanā – ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlā. Ye vā pana kusalamūlā, sabbe
anya-e0906n:175_1: te dhammā kusalā. Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlena ekamūlā. Ye vā pana
anya-e0906n:175_2: kusalamūlena ekamūlā, sabbe te dhammā kusalā. Ye keci kusalamūlena ekamūlā dhammā,
anya-e0906n:175_3: sabbe te dhammā kusalamūlena aññamaññamūlā. Ye vā pana kusalamūlena aññamaññamūlā,
anya-e0906n:175_4: sabbe te dhammā kusalāti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ mūlayamakaṃ bāvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:175_5: ca tikehi dukasatena ca vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:176: Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlā.
anya-e0906n:177: Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlāti, tīṇeva kusalamūlāni avasesā kusalā dhammā, na kusalamūlā, ye vā pana kusalamūlā, sabbe te dhammā kusalāti, āmantā –
anya-e0906n:179: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dutiyaṃ khandhayamakaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:180_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dutiyaṃ khandhayamakaṃ
anya-e0906n:180_2: Rūpaṃ rūpakkhandho, rūpakkhandho rūpaṃ. Vedanā vedanākkhandho, vedanākkhandho vedanā.
anya-e0906n:180_3: Saññā saññākkhandho, saññākkhandho saññā. Saṅkhārā saṅkhārakkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho
anya-e0906n:180_4: saṅkhārā. Viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho, viññāṇakkhandho viññāṇa”nti evamādinā bhagavatā
anya-e0906n:182: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe tatiyaṃ āyatanayamakaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:183_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe tatiyaṃ āyatanayamakaṃ
anya-e0906n:183_2: rūpāyatanaṃ saddāyatanaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ manāyatanaṃ
anya-e0906n:183_3: dhammāyatanaṃ. Cakkhu cakkhāyatanaṃ, cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhu. Sotaṃ sotāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ
anya-e0906n:185: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu catutthaṃ dhātuyamakaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:186_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu catutthaṃ
anya-e0906n:186_1: dhātuyamakaṃ “aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo – cakkhudhātu sotadhātu ghānadhātu jivhādhātu kāyadhātu
anya-e0906n:186_2: rūpadhātu saddadhātu gandhadhātu rasadhātu phoṭṭhabbadhātu cakkhuviññāṇadhātu sotaviññāṇadhātu
anya-e0906n:186_3: ghānaviññāṇadhātu jivhāviññāṇadhātu kāyaviññāṇadhātu manodhātu manoviññāṇadhātu dhammadhātū”ti
anya-e0906n:188: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu pañcamaṃ saccayamakaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:189_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu pañcamaṃ
anya-e0906n:189_1: saccayamakaṃ “cattāri saccāni – dukkhasaccaṃ samudayasaccaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ maggasaccaṃ.
anya-e0906n:189_2: Dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, dukkhasaccaṃ dukkhaṃ. Samudayo samudayasaccaṃ, samudayasaccaṃ
anya-e0906n:189_3: samudayo. Nirodho nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhasaccaṃ nirodho. Maggo maggasaccaṃ, maggasaccaṃ
anya-e0906n:189_4: maggo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:191: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu chaṭṭhaṃ saṅkhārayamakaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:192_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu chaṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0906n:192_1: saṅkhārayamakaṃ “tayo saṅkhārā – kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro, cittasaṅkhāro. Assāsapassāsā
anya-e0906n:192_2: kāyasaṅkhāro, vitakkavicārā vacīsaṅkhārā, saññā ca vedanā ca cittasaṅkhāro ṭhapetvā
anya-e0906n:192_3: vitakkavicāre sabbepi cittasampayuttakā dhammā cittasaṅkhāro”ti evamādinā bhagavatā
anya-e0906n:194: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu sattamaṃ anusayayamakaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:195_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu sattamaṃ
anya-e0906n:195_1: anusayayamakaṃ “satta anusayā – kāmarāgānusayo paṭighānusayo mānānusayo diṭṭhānusayo
anya-e0906n:195_2: vicikicchānusayo bhavarāgānusayo avijjānusayo. Kattha kāmarāgānusayo anuseti, kāmadhātuyā
anya-e0906n:195_3: dvīsu vedanāsu ettha kāmarāgānusayo anusetī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā uppattiṭṭhānavāra
anya-e0906n:195_4: anusayavāra sānusayavāra pajahanavāra pariññāvāra pahīnavāra uppajjanavāra dhātuvārasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0906n:197: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu aṭṭhamaṃ cittayamakaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:198_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu aṭṭhamaṃ
anya-e0906n:198_1: cittayamakaṃ “yassa cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati, tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissati na
anya-e0906n:198_2: uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissati, tassa cittaṃ uppajjati
anya-e0906n:198_4: saṅkhātehi tīhi mahānayeti vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:200: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu navamaṃ dhammayamakaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:201_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu navamaṃ
anya-e0906n:201_1: dhammayamakaṃ “kusalā kusalā dhammā, kusalā dhammā kusalā. Akusalā akusalā dhammā,
anya-e0906n:201_2: akusalā dhammā akusalā. Abyākatā abyākatā dhammā, abyākatā dhammā abyākatā”ti evamādinā
anya-e0906n:201_3: bhagavatā paṇṇattivārapavattivārapariññāvārasaṅkhātehi tīhi mahāvārehi vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:203: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu dasamaṃ indriyayamakaṃ bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:204_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu dasamaṃ
anya-e0906n:204_2: kāyindriyaṃ itthindriyaṃ purisindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ manindriyaṃ sukhindriyaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ
anya-e0906n:204_3: somanassindriyaṃ domanassindriyaṃ upekkhindriyaṃ saddhindriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ
anya-e0906n:204_4: paññindriyaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ aññindriyaṃ aññātāvindriya”nti evamādinā bhagavatā
anya-e0906n:204_5: paṇṇattivāra pavattivāra pariññāvārasaṅkhātehi tīhi mahāvārehi vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:206: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso indriyayamake tīsu mahāvāresu pavattivāre uppādaatītavāro bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:207_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante indriyayamake tīsu mahāvāresu pavattivāre uppādaatītavāro
anya-e0906n:207_1: “yassa cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjitta, tassa sotindriyaṃ, ghānindriyaṃ, jivhindriyaṃ, kāyindriyaṃ,
anya-e0906n:207_2: itthindriyaṃ, purisindriyaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ, somanassindriyaṃ, upekkhindriyaṃ, saddhindriyaṃ,
anya-e0906n:207_3: vīriyindriyaṃ, satindriyaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ, paññindriyaṃ, manindriyaṃ, uppajjitthāti,
anya-e0906n:207_4: āmantā. Yassa vā pana manindriyaṃ uppajjittha, tassa cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjitthāti,
anya-e0906n:209: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso indriyayamake tīsu mahāvāresu pavattivāre uppādaanāgatavāro bhagavatā kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:210_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante indriyayamake tīsu mahāvāresu pavattivāre uppādaanāgatavāro
anya-e0906n:210_1: “yassa cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjissati, tassa sotindriyaṃ uppajjissatīti, āmantā. Yassa
anya-e0906n:210_2: vā pana sotindriyaṃ uppajjissati, tassa cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjissatī”ti āmantā. Yassa
anya-e0906n:210_3: cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjissati, tassa ghānindriyaṃ, jivhindriyaṃ, kāyindriyaṃ uppajjissatīti,
anya-e0906n:210_4: ye rūpāvacaraṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjissati, no
anya-e0906n:210_5: ca tesaṃ kāyindriyaṃ uppajjissati, itaresaṃ tesaṃ cakkhundriyañca uppajjissati kāyindriyañca
anya-e0906n:210_6: uppajjissatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:211_0: Yassa cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjissati, tassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjissatīti. Ye rūpāvacaraṃ
anya-e0906n:211_1: upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, ye ca purisā eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā
anya-e0906n:211_2: parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ itthindriyaṃ uppajjissati,
anya-e0906n:211_3: itaresaṃ tesaṃ cakkhundriyañca uppajjissati itthindriyañca uppajjissati.
anya-e0906n:212_0: Yassa cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjissati, tassa purisindriyaṃ uppajjissatīti, ye rūpāvacaraṃ
anya-e0906n:212_1: upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, yā ca itthiyo eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā
anya-e0906n:212_2: parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ purisindriyaṃ uppajjissati.
anya-e0906n:212_3: Itaresaṃ tesaṃ cakkhundriyañca uppajjissati purisindriyañca uppajjissati.
anya-e0906n:213_0: Yassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjissati, tassa purisindriyaṃ uppajjissatīti, yā itthiyo eteneva
anya-e0906n:213_1: bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti, tāsaṃ itthindriyaṃ uppajjissati,
anya-e0906n:213_2: no ca tāsaṃ purisindriyaṃ uppajjissati. Itaresaṃ tesaṃ itthindriyañca uppajjissati
anya-e0906n:215_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena abhisambuddhakālato
anya-e0906n:215_1: sattamavasse manussaloke yamakapāṭihīraṃ dassetvā tadanantaraṃ tāvatiṃsadevalokaṃ
anya-e0906n:215_2: gantvā tattha paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ sannisīditvā dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi āgamma sannisinnānaṃ
anya-e0906n:215_3: devānaṃ abhidhammadesanaṃ desentena yāva yamakappakaraṇā purimāni cha abhidhammappakaraṇāni
anya-e0906n:216_0: Vissajjanā – tena bhante bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena abhisambuddhakālato
anya-e0906n:216_1: sattame vasse manussaloke sāvatthiyaṃ kaṇḍambamūle yamakapāṭihīraṃ dassetvā tadanantaraṃ
anya-e0906n:216_2: tāvatiṃsadevalokaṃ gantvā tattha paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ sannipatitvā dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi
anya-e0906n:216_3: āgamma sannisinnānaṃ devānaṃ abhidhammadesanaṃ desentena purimāni cha abhidhammappakaraṇāni
anya-e0906n:216_4: desetvā tadanantaraṃ anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma sattamaṃ mahāpakaraṇaṃ desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:217: Pucchā – taṃ panetaṃ āvuso paṭṭhānaṃ kenaṭṭhena paṭṭhānanti vuccati.
anya-e0906n:218: Vissajjanā – taṃ panetaṃ bhante paṭṭhānaṃ nānappakārapaccayaṭṭhena vibhajanaṭṭhena paṭṭhitaṭṭhena ca paṭṭhānanti vuccati.
anya-e0906n:219: Pucchā – tañcāvuso bhagavatā paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇaṃ desentena katihi vārehi vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:220: Vissajjanā – taṃ kho bhante bhagavatā paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇaṃ desentena mātikānikkhepavārasaṅkhāto paccayuddeso paccayaniddeso mahāvāreti dvīhi paricchedavārehi vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:221: Pucchā – tesu āvuso vāresu paṭhame mātikānikkhepavāre paccayuddesavāro bhagavatā kathaṃ desito.
anya-e0906n:222_0: Vissajjanā – tesu bhante dvīsu paricchedavāresu paṭhame mātikānikkhepavāre paccayuddese
anya-e0906n:222_1: hetupaccayo ārammaṇapaccayo adhipatipaccayo anantarapaccayo samanantarapaccayo sahajātapaccayo
anya-e0906n:222_2: aññamaññapaccayo nissayapaccayo…pe… avigatapaccayo”ti. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:223: Pucchā – tadanantaraṃ pana āvuso paccayaniddesavāro bhagavatā kathaṃ vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:224_0: Vissajjanā – tadanantaraṃ pana bhante paccayaniddesavāro “hetupaccayoti – hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ
anya-e0906n:224_1: dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇapaccayoti – rūpārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0906n:224_2: cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Saddhāyatanaṃ
anya-e0906n:224_5: paccayo. Rūpāyatanaṃ saddāyatanaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ manodhātuyā
anya-e0906n:224_6: taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Sabbe dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā
anya-e0906n:224_7: taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0906n:224_8: ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā, te te dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ
anya-e0906n:224_9: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:225: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena abhidhammapiṭake sattame mahāpakaraṇe dvīsu padhānavāresu dutiye mahāvāre kati ṭhānāni vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:226_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:226_1: mahāpakaraṇe dvīsu padhānaparicchedavāresu dutiye mahāvāre dhammānulome cha paṭṭhānāni,
anya-e0906n:226_2: tathā dhammapaccanīye dhammānulomapaccanīye dhammapaccanīyānulometi catuvīsati paṭṭhānāni
anya-e0906n:228: Pucchā – tesupi āvuso catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatitikā bhagavatā katihi vārehi vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:229_0: Vissajjanā – tesu bhante catuvīsatiyā mahāpaṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:229_1: dvāvīsatitikā paṭiccavāro sahajātavāro paccayavāro nissayavāro saṃsaṭṭhavāro sampayuttavāro
anya-e0906n:229_2: pañhāvāroti sattahi sattahi vārehi vibhajitvā bhagavatā desitā.
anya-e0906n:231: Pucchā – tesu cāvuso dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu paṭhamo paṭiccamahāvāro bhagavatā kathaṃ vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:232_0: Vissajjanā – tesu bhante dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu
anya-e0906n:232_1: paṭhamo paṭiccamahāvāro siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:232_2: Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā. Siyā kusalaṃ
anya-e0906n:232_3: dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā. Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
anya-e0906n:232_4: kusalā ca abyākatā ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṃ hetupaccayā. Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
anya-e0906n:232_5: akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṃ hetupaccayā. Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
anya-e0906n:232_6: kusalo ca akusalo ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṃ hetupaccayā. Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
anya-e0906n:232_7: kusalo ca akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṃ hetupaccayā”ti evamādinā pucchāvārena
anya-e0906n:232_8: ca. “Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ
anya-e0906n:232_9: paṭicca tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
anya-e0906n:232_10: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusale khandhe paṭicca
anya-e0906n:232_11: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti
anya-e0906n:232_12: hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ,
anya-e0906n:232_13: tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe paṭicca dve
anya-e0906n:232_14: khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpa”nti evamādinā vissajjanā vissajjanāvārena ca. “Hetuyā
anya-e0906n:232_15: nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe
anya-e0906n:232_16: tīṇi, nissaye nava, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme nava, vipāke
anya-e0906n:232_17: ekaṃ, āhāre jhāne indriye magge nava, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte atthiyā nava, natthiyā
anya-e0906n:232_18: vigate tīṇi, avigate navā”ti evamādinā saṅkhyāvārena ca bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:233: Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:235_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena abhidhammapiṭake mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:235_1: paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike
anya-e0906n:235_2: sattasu mahāvāresu dutiyo sahajātavāro kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:236_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante anantanayapaṭṭhāne mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:236_1: paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike
anya-e0906n:236_2: sattasu mahāvāresu dutiyo sahajātāvāro “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sahajāto kusalo dhammo uppajjati
anya-e0906n:236_3: hetupaccayā, kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ sahajātā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe sahajāto eko
anya-e0906n:236_4: khandho, dve khandhe sahajātā dve khandhā. Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sahajāto abyākato dhammo
anya-e0906n:236_5: uppajjati hetupaccayā, kusale khandhe sahajātaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ
anya-e0906n:236_6: sahajāto kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā, kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ
anya-e0906n:236_7: sahajātā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, tayo khandhe sahajāto eko khandho
anya-e0906n:236_8: cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpa”nti evamādinā vissajjanāvārena
anya-e0906n:236_9: ca. Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare tīṇī”ti evamādinā
anya-e0906n:236_10: saṅkhyāvārena ca vācanāmaggato dvīhi vārehi paṭimaṇḍitvā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:238_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:238_1: paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike
anya-e0906n:238_2: sattasu mahāvāresu tatiyo paccayavāro kathaṃ vibhajitvā vitthārena desito.
anya-e0906n:239_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:239_1: mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne bāvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:239_2: tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu tatiyo paccayavāro “siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ
anya-e0906n:239_3: paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā, siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo
anya-e0906n:239_4: dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā, siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjeyya
anya-e0906n:239_5: hetupaccayā”ti evamādinā pucchāvārena ca. “Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo
anya-e0906n:239_6: uppajjati hetupaccayā, kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paccayā
anya-e0906n:239_7: eko khandho, dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā”ti evamādinā vissajjanāvārena ca. “Hetuyā
anya-e0906n:239_8: sattarasa, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare samanantare satta, sahajāte
anya-e0906n:239_9: sattarasa. Aññamaññe sattā”ti evamādinā saṅkhyāvārena ca. Paccayānuloma paccaya paccaniya
anya-e0906n:239_10: paccayānuloma paccanīya paccaya paccanīyānulomasaṅkhātehi catūhi nayehi vibhajitvā bhagavatā desito.
anya-e0906n:240: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paccayā eko khandho, dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā- ….
anya-e0906n:242_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena abhidhammapiṭake sattasu mahāpakaraṇesu
anya-e0906n:242_1: sattame paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:242_2: dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattamo pañhāvāro kathaṃ
anya-e0906n:243_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:243_1: mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:243_2: tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattamo pañhāvāro “siyā kusalo dhammo
anya-e0906n:243_3: kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Siyā kusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa
anya-e0906n:243_4: hetupaccayena paccayo. Siyā kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo”ti
anya-e0906n:243_5: evamādinā pucchāvārena ca. “Kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:243_6: kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa
anya-e0906n:243_7: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo, kusalā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena
anya-e0906n:243_8: paccayo”ti evamādinā vissajjanāvārena ca “hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā
anya-e0906n:243_9: dasa, anantare samanantare satta, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa,
anya-e0906n:243_10: upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṃ. Āhāre
anya-e0906n:243_11: indriye jhāne magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā
anya-e0906n:243_12: vigate satta, avigate terasā”ti evamādinā saṅkhyāvārena ca paccayānulomapaccayapaccanīyapaccayānulomapaccanīyapaccayapaccanīyānulomasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0906n:243_13: catūhi nayehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:244_0: Kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo, kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ
anya-e0906n:244_1: khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena
anya-e0906n:244_2: paccayo, kusalā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo
anya-e0906n:244_3: kusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo, kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ
anya-e0906n:247_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena abhidhammapiṭake sattasu pakaraṇesu
anya-e0906n:247_1: sattame paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:247_2: dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattame pañhāvāre pucchāvissajjanāsaṅkhyāvārasaṅkhātesu
anya-e0906n:247_3: tīsu vāresu vissajjanāvāre hetupaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:248_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:248_1: mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:248_2: tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattame pañhāvāre paccayānulomapaccayapaccanīya
anya-e0906n:248_3: paccayānuloma paccanīyapaccaya paccayanīyānulomasaṅkhātesu catūsu nayesu paṭhame
anya-e0906n:248_5: vissajjanāvāre hetupaccayavibhaṅgo “kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena
anya-e0906n:248_6: paccayo, kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo
anya-e0906n:248_7: abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ
anya-e0906n:248_8: hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo kusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena
anya-e0906n:248_9: paccayo, kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena
anya-e0906n:248_10: paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:249_0: … “Kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo, kusalā hetū sampayattakānaṃ
anya-e0906n:249_1: khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena
anya-e0906n:249_2: paccayo, kusalā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo
anya-e0906n:249_3: kusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo, kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ
anya-e0906n:251_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena abhidhammapiṭake sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame
anya-e0906n:251_1: paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:251_2: tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattame pañhāvāre catūsu nayesu paṭhame
anya-e0906n:251_3: paccayānulomanaye pucchāvissajjanāsaṅkhyāvārasaṅkhātesu tīsu vāresu dutiye vissajjanāvāre
anya-e0906n:251_4: hetupaccayavibhaṅgādīsu catuvīsatiyā vibhaṅgesu dutiyo ārammaṇapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṃ
anya-e0906n:252_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:252_1: mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:252_2: tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattame pañhāvāre catūsu nayesu paṭhame
anya-e0906n:252_3: paccayānulomanaye tīsu ca vāresu dutiye vibhaṅgavāre hetupaccayavibhaṅgādīsu catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:252_4: vibhaṅgesu dutiyo ārammaṇapaccayavibhaṅgo “kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
anya-e0906n:252_5: paccayo, dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe
anya-e0906n:252_6: suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati, sekkhā gotrabhuṃ
anya-e0906n:252_7: paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ paccavekkhanti, sekkhā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti,
anya-e0906n:252_8: sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā kusalaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, cetopariyañāṇena
anya-e0906n:252_11: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Kusalā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa,
anya-e0906n:252_12: yathākammupagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā
anya-e0906n:254_0: Pucchā – abhidhammapiṭake āvuso sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:254_1: paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhānesu bāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike
anya-e0906n:254_2: sattasu mahāvāresu sattame pañhāvāre catūsu nayesu paṭhame paccayānulomanaye pucchāvissajjanāsaṅkhyāsaṅkhātesu
anya-e0906n:254_3: tīsu vāresu dutiye vissajjanāsaṅkhāte vibhaṅgavāre hetupaccayavibhaṅgādīsu catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:254_4: vibhaṅgesu tatiyo adhipatipaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:255_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:255_1: mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne bāvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:255_2: tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattame pañhāvāre catūsu nayesu paṭhame
anya-e0906n:255_3: paccayānulomanaye pucchāvissajjanāsaṅkhyāsaṅkhātesu tīsu vāresu dutiye vissajjanāsaṅkhāte
anya-e0906n:255_4: vibhaṅgavāre hetupaccayavibhaṅgādīsu catuvīsatiyā vibhaṅgesu tatiyo adhipatipaccayavibhaṅgo
anya-e0906n:255_5: “kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
anya-e0906n:255_6: Ārammaṇādhipati–dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā
anya-e0906n:255_7: paccavekkhati. Pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ
anya-e0906n:255_8: garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, sekkhā gotrabhuṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ garuṃ
anya-e0906n:255_9: katvā paccavekkhanti, sekkhā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti.
anya-e0906n:257: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… catuttho anantarapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:258_1: dhammo kusalassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo, purimā purimā kusalā khandhā
anya-e0906n:258_2: pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. Anulomaṃ
anya-e0906n:258_3: gotrabhussa, anulomaṃ vodānassa, gotrabhu maggassa, vodānaṃ maggassa anantarapaccayena
anya-e0906n:258_4: paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:260: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… chaṭṭho sahajātapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:261_1: dhammo kusalassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo, kusalo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ
anya-e0906n:261_2: khandhānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo, tayo khandhā ekassa khandhassa sahajātapaccayena
anya-e0906n:261_3: paccayo, dve dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa
anya-e0906n:261_4: dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo, kusalā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ sahajātapaccayena
anya-e0906n:261_5: paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:263: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… navamo upanissayapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:264_1: dhammo kusalassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo,
anya-e0906n:264_2: pakatūpanissayo. Ārammaṇūpanissayo–dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā
anya-e0906n:265_0: Pakatūpanissayo – saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti sīlaṃ samādiyati uposathakammaṃ karoti,
anya-e0906n:265_1: jhānaṃ uppādeti, vipassanaṃ uppādeti, maggaṃ uppādeti, abhiññaṃ uppādeti, samāpattiṃ
anya-e0906n:265_2: uppādetī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:267: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… dasamo purejātapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:268_1: dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ.
anya-e0906n:268_2: Ārammaṇapurejātaṃ–arahā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati. Ghānaṃ, jivhaṃ,
anya-e0906n:268_3: kāyaṃ, rūpe, sadde, gandhe, rase, phoṭṭhabbe, vatthuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato
anya-e0906n:268_4: vipassati. Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṃ
anya-e0906n:268_5: cakkhuviññāṇassa, saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇassa, gandhāyatanaṃ ghānaviññāṇassa, rasāyatanaṃ
anya-e0906n:268_6: jivhāviññāṇassa, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. Vatthupurejātaṃ–cakkhāyatanaṃ
anya-e0906n:268_7: cakkhuviññāṇassa, sotāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇassa, ghānāyatanaṃ ghānaviññāṇassa, jivhāyatanaṃ
anya-e0906n:268_8: jivhāviññāṇassa, kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, vatthu vipākābyākatānaṃ kriyābyākatānaṃ
anya-e0906n:268_9: khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:270: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… terasamo kammapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:271_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante…pe… terasamo kammapaccayavibhaṅgo “kusalo dhammo
anya-e0906n:271_1: kusalassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo, kusalā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
anya-e0906n:271_2: kammapaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:271_3: Sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. Sahajātā–kusalā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena
anya-e0906n:271_4: paccayo. Nānākkhaṇikā–kusalā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena
anya-e0906n:271_5: paccayo. Kusalo dhammo kusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:271_6: Kusalā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena
anya-e0906n:271_7: paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:273: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… pannarasamo āhārapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:274_1: dhammo kusalassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. Kusalā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
anya-e0906n:274_2: āhārapaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:274_3: Kusalā āhārā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā
anya-e0906n:276: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… soḷasamo indriyapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṃ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:277_1: dhammo kusalassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo, kusalo indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ
anya-e0906n:277_2: khandhānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena
anya-e0906n:277_3: paccayo, kusalā indriyā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā
anya-e0906n:279: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… pucchāvissajjanāsaṅkhyāvārasaṅkhātesu tīsu vāresu tatiyo saṅkhyāvāro kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:280_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante…pe… tatiyo saṅkhyāvāro “hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe
anya-e0906n:280_1: nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantara samanantare satta, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi,
anya-e0906n:280_2: nissaye terasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke
anya-e0906n:280_3: ekaṃ, āhāre indriye jhāne magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā
anya-e0906n:280_4: terasa, natthiyā vigate satta, avigate terasā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:281: Hetu sahajāta nissaya atthi avigatanti satta, hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya atthi avigatanti tīṇi, hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya sampayutta atthi avigatanti tīṇi …
anya-e0906n:283: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… paṭhamaṃ kusalattikaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā tadanantaraṃ avasesā vedanāttikādayo ekavīsatitikā kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:284_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante…pe… paṭhamaṃ kusalattikaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā
anya-e0906n:284_1: tadanantaraṃ avasesā vedanāttikādayo ekavīsatitikā “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ
anya-e0906n:284_2: dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhāya
anya-e0906n:284_3: vedanāya sampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho,
anya-e0906n:284_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā,
anya-e0906n:284_5: dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho”ti evamādinā ca. Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko dhammo
anya-e0906n:284_6: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Vipākaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca
anya-e0906n:284_7: eko khandho, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ
anya-e0906n:284_8: paṭicca tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
anya-e0906n:284_9: Vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā, vipāke
anya-e0906n:284_10: khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipāke khandhe paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ,
anya-e0906n:284_11: khandhe paṭicca vatthū”ti evamādinā ca ekekasmiṃ tike sattahi sattahi mahāvārehi
anya-e0906n:284_12: ekekasmiñca mahāvāre catūhi catūhi nayehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:286: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… tikapaṭṭhānādīsu chasu antogadhapaṭṭhānādīsu paṭhamaṃ tikapaṭṭhānaṃ desetvā tadanantaraṃ dukapaṭṭhānaṃ kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:287_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante…pe… tikapaṭṭhānādīsu chasu antogadhapaṭṭhānādīsu
anya-e0906n:287_1: paṭhamaṃ tikapaṭṭhānaṃ vibhajitvā tadanantaraṃ dukapaṭṭhānaṃ “hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
anya-e0906n:287_2: hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā, alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho, adosaṃ paṭicca alobho
anya-e0906n:287_3: amoho, amohaṃ paṭicca alobho adoso. Lobhaṃ paṭicca moho, mohaṃ paṭicca lobho, dosaṃ
anya-e0906n:287_4: paṭicca moho, mohaṃ paṭicca doso”ti evamādinā ca. Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo
anya-e0906n:287_5: dammo uppajjati hetupaccayā, saraṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe
anya-e0906n:287_6: paṭicca eko khandho, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo
anya-e0906n:287_7: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā, saraṇo khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Saraṇaṃ
anya-e0906n:287_8: dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo ca araṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Saraṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ
anya-e0906n:287_9: paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca
anya-e0906n:287_10: rūpaṃ, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpa”nti evamādinā ca.
anya-e0906n:287_11: Ekekasmiṃ duke sattahi sattahi mahāvārehi ekekasmiñca mahāvāre catūhi catūhi nayehi
anya-e0906n:288: Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā, saraṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho, dve
anya-e0906n:291_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… tikapaṭṭhānādīsu chasu antogadhapaṭṭhānesu paṭhamaṃ tikapaṭṭhānañca
anya-e0906n:291_1: dutiyaṃ dukapaṭṭhānañca vibhajitvā tadavasesāni dukatikapaṭṭhānādīni cattāro paṭṭhānāni
anya-e0906n:292_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante…pe… tikapaṭṭhānādīsu chasu antogadhapaṭṭhānesu
anya-e0906n:292_1: paṭhamaṃ tikapaṭṭhānañca dutiyaṃ dukapaṭṭhānañca vibhajitvā tadavasesā dukatikapaṭṭhānādayo
anya-e0906n:292_2: “hetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṃ kusalaṃ
anya-e0906n:292_3: dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ
anya-e0906n:292_4: paṭicca hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā, nahetuṃ kusalaṃ
anya-e0906n:292_5: dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā, nahetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ
anya-e0906n:292_6: paṭicca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā, nahetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
anya-e0906n:292_7: hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā”ti evamādinā vitthārato
anya-e0906n:294: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… paṭhamaṃ dhammānulomapaṭṭhānaṃ vibhajitvā tadanantaraṃ dutiyaṃ dhammapaccanīyapaṭṭhānaṃ kathaṃ vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:295_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante…pe… paṭhamaṃ dhammānulomapaṭṭhānaṃ vibhajitvā
anya-e0906n:295_1: tadanantaraṃ dutiyaṃ dhammapaccanīyapaṭṭhānaṃ “nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo
anya-e0906n:295_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca akusalābyākatā
anya-e0906n:295_3: tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. Tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca
anya-e0906n:295_4: rūpaṃ. Dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ
anya-e0906n:295_5: paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā. Vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ
anya-e0906n:295_6: khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. Tayo khandhe paṭicca eko
anya-e0906n:295_7: khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. Dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca
anya-e0906n:295_8: rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati
anya-e0906n:295_9: hetupaccayā. Akusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko
anya-e0906n:295_10: khandho, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā”ti evamādinā tikapaṭṭhānādīhi chahi antogadhapaṭṭhānehi
anya-e0906n:295_11: ekekasmiñca tikapaṭṭhāne dukapaṭṭhāne dukatikapaṭṭhāne tikadukapaṭṭhāne tikatikapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:295_12: dukadukapaṭṭhāne sattahi sattahi mahāvārehi ekekasmiñca mahāvāre catūhi catūhi nayehi
anya-e0906n:297: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… tatiyaṃ dhammānulomapaccanīyapaṭṭhānaṃ kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:298_1: dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusale khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ.
anya-e0906n:298_2: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ
anya-e0906n:298_3: paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. Tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca
anya-e0906n:298_4: rūpaṃ. Dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ. Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ
anya-e0906n:298_5: paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo
anya-e0906n:298_6: khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. Kusalaṃ
anya-e0906n:298_7: dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ
anya-e0906n:298_8: ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ
anya-e0906n:298_9: paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Kusale khandhe paṭicca
anya-e0906n:298_10: cittasamuṭṭhānarūpa”nti evamādinā bhante tikapaṭṭhānādīhi chahi antogadhapaṭṭhānehi
anya-e0906n:298_11: ekekasmiñca tikapaṭṭhāne dukapaṭṭhāne tikadukapaṭṭhāne dukatikapaṭṭhāne tikatikapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:298_12: dukadukapaṭṭhāne sattahi sattahi mahāvārehi ekekasmiñca mahāvāre catūhi catūhi nayehi
anya-e0906n:300: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… dhammānulomādīsu padhānabhūtesu catūsu paṭṭhānesu catutthaṃ pariyosānabhūtaṃ dhammapaccanīyānulomapaṭṭhānaṃ kathaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
anya-e0906n:301_0: Vissajjanā – abhidhammapiṭake bhante…pe… dhammānulomapaṭṭhānādīsu catūsu padhānabhūtesu
anya-e0906n:301_2: dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā, akusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca
anya-e0906n:301_3: tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
anya-e0906n:301_4: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusale khandhe
anya-e0906n:301_5: paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ, vipākābyākataṃ kriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca
anya-e0906n:301_6: tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca
anya-e0906n:301_7: rūpaṃ. Khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā. Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
anya-e0906n:301_8: naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā, akusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā,
anya-e0906n:301_9: tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā”ti evamādinā tikapaṭṭhānādīhi
anya-e0906n:301_10: cāti antogadhapabhedapaṭṭhānehi ekekasmiñca tikapaṭṭhāne dukapaṭṭhāne dukatikatikadukatikatikadukadukapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:301_11: paṭiccavārādīhi sattahi mahāvārehi ekekasmiñca mahāvāre paccayānulomādīhi catūhi
anya-e0906n:301_12: catūhi nayehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṃ.
